p: Additionally, following the last field survey (72 h after the treatment), two randomly-chosen leaves per plant carrying OSW puparia (IV instar) were collected, placed in aerated Petri dishes covered with aphid-net, sealed with rubber band, and stored in a climatic chamber (27 °C, 70%RH, 16:8 L:D photoperiod). Adults emergence rate was checked daily for two weeks until no adults were found on the Petri dishes.
